metadata.name: Suspicious Rundll32 Execution With Image Extension
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of Rundll32.exe with DLL files masquerading as image files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cr2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.eps')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ico')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.nef')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.orf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.raw')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sr2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tif')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tiff'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of Rundll32.exe with DLL files masquerading as image files
